actions.text: Amendment SA 2263 not agreed to in Senate by Division Vote.
Amendment SA 2263 proposed by Senator Specter to Amendment SA 2233. (consideration: CR S296-297; text: CR S296) To provide for the restoration of certain plans terminating in 2003.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2263 not agreed to in Senate by Division Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2263 proposed by Senator Specter to Amendment SA 2233.

amends_amendment.purpose: Substitute amendment to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to temporarily change the determination of the interest rate used for funding and other purposes from use of the 30-year treasury bond rate to a composite corporate bond rate, and for other purposes.

purpose: To provide for the restoration of certain plans terminating in 2003.
